Basic understanding of digital marketing concepts

Understanding of statistics and machine learning

title: Content Writing Internship
description: Create engaging content for blogs, social media, and marketing materials. You'll work on various content types including blog posts, social media updates, and email newsletters. This role offers hands-on experience in content strategy and digital marketing.
